1 /*global define, playlistUrl */
  2 /*jshint browser:true */
  3 define(["jquery-1", "gelui-1/autosuggest", "gelui-1/overlay", "bump-1"], function ($, AutoSuggest, Overlay, empMediaPlayer) {
  4     "use strict";
  5 
  6     /**
  7       * Combined methods for podcasts service
  8       * @class Represents the application
  9       */
 10     return function () {
 11 
 12         /** indexes and animation properties */
 13         var busy = false,
 14             index = 0,
 15             active = false,
 16             current = null,
 17             previous = null,
 18             qfInput = null,
 19             list = null,
 20             gelui = null,
 21             usersQuery;
 22 
 23         /** DOM assignments */
 24         var promo = $("#pc-promo"),
 25             buttons = $("#pc-buttons"),
 26             tabs = $("ul li a", buttons),
 27             items = ($(".pc-promo-items", promo).length > 0) ?
 28                     /** desktop */ $(".pc-promo-items", promo) :
 29                     /** mobile */ $("#index .module-list").hide(),
 30             tab = tabs.filter(".active"),
 31             maxmin = ($("#pc-promo-maxmin", buttons).length > 0) ?
 32                     /** desktop */ $("#pc-promo-maxmin", buttons) :
 33                     /** mobile */ $("#topcontainer h2#features");
 34 
 35         // hide elements by default
 36         $("ul", buttons).hide();
 37 
 38         /** default properties */
 39         var defaults = {
 40 
 41             type: "desktop",
 42 
 43             search: {
 44                 id: "ul.gelui-suggestionlist",
 45                 maxlength: 13,
 46                 url: "/podcasts/search.jsonp",
 47                 items: 3,
 48                 /* BBC Search global will inherit these settings! */
 49                 defaults: {
 50                     dataType: "jsonp",
 51                     cache: true,
 52                     context: this,
 53                     jsonpCallback: "podcastCallback",
 54                     contentType: "application/javascript"
 55                 }
 56             },
 57 
 58             emp: {
 59                 id: "pc-emp-container",
 60                 playlist: "http://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer/playlist/p00tjmsj"
 61             },
 62 
 63             keepnet: {
 64                 id: "pc-keepnet-sidebar"
 65             },
 66 
 67             filterText: "Show/Hide featured podcasts",
 68 
 69             mobile: {
 70 
 71                 video: {
 72                     height: 180,
 73                     width: 320
 74                 }
 75             },
 76 
 77             desktop: {
 78 
 79                 video: {
 80                     height: 252,
 81                     width: 448
 82                 },
 83 
 84                 audio: {
 85                     height: 115,
 86                     width: 376,
 87                     id: "pc-keepnet-player-box"
 88                 }
 89             }
 90         },
 91 
 92         /**
 93           * Get default properties from custom settings
 94           * @returns {Object} Map of properties
 95           * @function
 96           */
 97         getDefaults = function () {
 98             return (defaults.hasOwnProperty("search")) ? defaults : {};
 99         },
100 
101         /**
102           * Set default properties
103           * @param {Object:jQuery} opts Map of properties.
104           * @function
105           */
106         setDefaults = function (opts) {
107             opts = opts || {};
108             defaults = $.extend(true, getDefaults(), opts);
109         },
110 
111         /**
112           * Set default HTTP request properties
113           * @param {Object:jQuery} opts Map of properties.
114           * @function
115           */
116         ajaxSetup = function (obj) {
117             $.ajaxSetup(obj || {});
118         },
119 
120         /**
121           * Set DOM style properties, eg., show/hide CSS
122           * @param {Boolean} show true to make visible, otherwise false to hide.
123           * @function
124           */
125         setVisibility = function (show, e) {
126             return (show) ?
127                 {height: (e !== undefined) ? e.height() : "inherit", opacity: 1, "z-index": 90 } :
128                 {height: 0, opacity: 0, "z-index": 0 };
129         },
130 
131         /**
132           * Set default request properties
133           * @param {Object:jQuery} e jQuery DOM element.
134           * @param {Boolean} show true to make visible, otherwise false to hide.
135           * @param {Function} fn Callback function.
136           * @function
137           */
138         animateTabSwap = function (e, show, fn) {
139 
140             busy = true;
141 
142             if (active) {
143                 tabs.removeClass("active");
144                 items.removeClass("active");
145                 tab.addClass("active");
146                 current.addClass("active");
147             }
148 
149             previous.addClass("active-cache");
150 
151             $(e).animate(setVisibility(show, e), 350, "linear", function () {
152 
153                 active = promo.is(":visible") ? true : false;
154 
155                 if (typeof fn === "function") {
156                     fn();
157                 }
158 
159                 busy = false;
160 
161             });
162 
163             previous.removeClass("active-cache");
164 
165         },
166 
167         /**
168           * Delegates changes prior to animation
169           * @param {Object:jQuery} current jQuery DOM element.
170           * @param {Object:jQuery} tab jQuery DOM element.
171           * @function
172           */
173         preSlideToggle = function (current) {
174             if (!isMobile()) {
175                 current.css(setVisibility(true));
176             }
177         },
178 
179         /**
180           * Delegates changes post animation
181           * @param {Object:jQuery} e jQuery DOM element.
182           * @param {Object:jQuery} current jQuery DOM element.
183           * @param {Object:jQuery} tab jQuery DOM element.
184           * @param {Object:jQuery} maxmin jQuery DOM element.
185           * @function
186           */
187         postSlideToggle = function (e, current, tab, maxmin) {
188 
189             active = $(e).is(":visible") ? true : false;
190 
191             if (!isMobile()) {
192 
193                 tab = $(tabs.get(index));
194                 current = $(items.get(index));
195 
196                 if (active) {
197                     tab.addClass("active");
198                     current.addClass("active");
199                     e.addClass("active");
200                 } else {
201                     tabs.removeClass("active");
202                     items.removeClass("active");
203                     e.removeClass("active");
204                 }
205 
206             }
207 
208             current.siblings().css(setVisibility(false));
209             current.css(setVisibility(true));
210 
211             $("a", maxmin).toggleClass("active");
212 
213         },
214 
215         /**
216           * Do show/hide via sliding animation
217           * @param {Object:jQuery} e jQuery DOM element.
218           * @param {Object:jQuery} current jQuery DOM element.
219           * @param {Object:jQuery} tab jQuery DOM element.
220           * @param {Object:jQuery} maxmin jQuery DOM element.
221           * @param {Function} fn Callback function.
222           * @function
223           */
224         animateSlideToggle = function (e, current, tab, maxmin, fn) {
225 
226             busy = true;
227 
228             preSlideToggle(current);
229 
230             $(e).slideToggle(650, function () {
231 
232                 postSlideToggle(e, current, tab, maxmin);
233 
234                 if (typeof fn === "function") {
235                     fn();
236                 }
237 
238                 busy = false;
239 
240             });
241 
242         },
243 
244         /**
245           * Do show/hide via sliding animation
246           * @param {Object:jQuery} e jQuery DOM element.
247           * @param {Object:jQuery} current jQuery DOM element.
248           * @param {Object:jQuery} tab jQuery DOM element.
249           * @param {Object:jQuery} maxmin jQuery DOM element.
250           * @param {Function} fn Callback function.
251           * @function
252           */
253         animateMaxMinFilter = function (e, current, tab, maxmin, fn) {
254             $("a", maxmin).bind("click", function (e) {
255                 e.preventDefault();
256                 e.stopPropagation();
257                 if (!busy) {
258                     animateSlideToggle(promo, current, tab, maxmin, function () {
259                         if (typeof fn === "function") {
260                             fn();
261                         }
262                     });
263                 }
264             });
265         },
266 
267         /**
268           * Determine if the device output.
269           * @returns {Boolean} true if "mobile", otherwise false.
270           * @function
271           */
272         isMobile = function () {
273             var opts = getDefaults();
274             return (opts.type === "mobile") ? true : false;
275         },
276 
277         /**
278           * Determine if the resource is a keepnet.
279           * @returns {Boolean} true if a "keepnet" page, otherwise false.
280           * @function
281           */
282         isKeepnet = function () {
283             var opts = getDefaults();
284             var id = opts.keepnet.id;
285             return ($("#" + id).length > 0) ? true : false;
286         },
287 
288         /**
289           * Truncate a string
290           * @param {String} str Content to truncate
291           * @param {Int} length Maximum length to truncate
292           * @returns {String} str Truncated string
293           * @function
294           */
295         truncate = function (str, length) {
296             if (str !== undefined && str !== "") {
297                 if (str.length > length) {
298                     str = str.replace(/[^\w\'\-\,\ ]+/g, "");
299                     str = str.substr(0, length) + '...';
300                     str = $.trim(str);
301                 }
302             } else {
303                 str = "";
304             }
305             return str;
306         },
307 
308         /*
309          * Detect Apple User Agent
310          * @returns {Boolean} true if User Agent exists, otherwise false
311          * @function
312          */
313         isAppleAgent = function () {
314             var ua = navigator.userAgent;
315             return (
316                 (ua.indexOf('iPhone') !== -1) || (ua.indexOf('iPod') !== -1) || (ua.indexOf('iPad') !== -1)
317             );
318         };
319 
320         /*************************************************************************/
321 
322         return {
323 
324             /** Custom properties */
325             obj: {},
326 
327             /**
328               * Determine if the resource has a EMP.
329               * @returns {Boolean} true if an EMP exists, otherwise false.
330               * @function
331               */
332             hasEmp: function () {
333                 var opts = this.obj;
334                 var id = opts.emp.id;
335                 return ($("#" + id).length > 0) ? true : false;
336             },
337 
338             /**
339               * Set default instance properties.
340               * @param {Object} opts A map of properties.
341               * @returns {Object} opts A map of properties.
342               * @function
343               */
344             setUp: function (opts) {
345 
346                 /** global default */
347                 if (typeof addEventListener === "function") {
348                     document.addEventListener("touchstart", function () {}, true);
349                 }
350 
351                 /** system defaults */
352                 setDefaults(opts || {});
353                 opts = getDefaults();
354                 ajaxSetup(opts.search.defaults || {});
355 
356                 return opts;
357 
358             },
359 
360             /**
361               * Initiate.
362               * @param {Object} opts A map of properties.
363               * @function
364               */
365             init: function (opts) {
366 
367                 var podcasts = this;
368 
369                 $(document).ready(function () {
370 
371                     podcasts.obj = podcasts.setUp(opts);
372 
373                     $("ul", buttons).show();
374 
375                     if (isMobile()) {
376                         /** Instantiate Mobile */
377                         podcasts.mobile();
378                     } else {
379                         /** Instantiate Desktop */
380                         podcasts.desktop();
381                     }
382 
383                     /** Instantiate EMP */
384                     if (podcasts.hasEmp()) {
385                         var empEmbed = podcasts.initEmpMediaPlayer();
386                         if ("write" in empEmbed) {
387                             empEmbed.write();
388                         }
389                     }
390 
391                     /** Instantiate Search */
392                     podcasts.initFinder();
393 
394                 });
395 
396             },
397 
398             /**
399               * Default desktop instance properties and methods.
400               * @function
401               */
402             desktop: function () {
403 
404                 // misc assignments
405                 var opts = this.obj,
406                     cta = $('<a href="#pc-promo" title="' + opts.filterText + '"><span><!--e--></span></a>');
407 
408                 // determine present index, ignore any activation if location.hash exists
409                 active = (window.location.hash !== "#results-list") ? true : false;
410                 active = (promo.hasClass('active') && active) ? true : false;
411 
412                 tab = $(tabs.get(index));
413 
414                 // insert show/hide CTA
415                 maxmin.wrapInner(cta);
416 
417                 // do content show/hides
418                 items.find("h2").hide();
419                 items.css(setVisibility(false));
420 
421                 // assign indexes, inline styles and return active index
422                 current = $(items.each(function (i, e) {
423                     $(tabs.get(i)).data("index", i);
424                     $(e).data("index", i).css({position: "absolute"});
425                 }).get(index)).css(setVisibility(true));
426 
427                 // init
428                 if (active) {
429                     animateSlideToggle(promo, current, tab, maxmin);
430                 } else {
431                     tab.removeClass("active");
432                 }
433 
434                 // is keepnet page?
435                 if (isKeepnet()) {
436                     this.keepnet();
437                 }
438 
439                 animateMaxMinFilter(promo, current, tab, maxmin);
440 
441                 // tab to content events
442                 tabs.bind("click", function (e) {
443 
444                     e.preventDefault();
445                     e.stopPropagation();
446 
447                     tab = $(e.target);
448 
449                     if (!busy) {
450 
451                         previous = $(items.get(index));
452                         index = tab.data("index");
453                         current = $(items.get(index));
454 
455                         // animate fade between tabs
456                         if (active && !tab.hasClass("active")) {
457 
458                             animateTabSwap(previous, false);
459                             animateTabSwap(current, true);
460 
461                         } else {
462 
463                             // animate slide to activate chosen tab
464                             animateSlideToggle(promo, current, tab, maxmin);
465 
466                         }
467 
468                     }
469 
470                 });
471 
472             },
473 
474             /**
475               * Default mobile instance properties and methods.
476               * @function
477               */
478             mobile: function () {
479 
480                 var opts = this.obj,
481                     cta = $('<a href="#features"/>'),
482                     ctaFilter = $('<span>' + opts.filterText + '</span>');
483 
484                 // determine present index, ignore any activation if location.hash exists
485                 active = (window.location.hash !== "#results-list") ? true : false;
486                 active = (promo.hasClass('active') && active) ? true : false;
487 
488                 $("ul", buttons).removeClass("blq-hide");
489 
490                 this.mobileFeatures(cta, ctaFilter);
491                 this.mobileNavigation();
492 
493             },
494 
495             /**
496               * Default Mobile feature properties.
497               * @param {Object:jQuery} cta DOM element.
498               * @param {String} text Show/hide button text.
499               * @function
500               */
501             mobileFeatures: function (cta, text) {
502 
503                 // determine present index
504                 current = $(".carousel", promo);
505 
506                 // insert show/hide CTA
507                 maxmin.wrapInner(cta).find("a").append(text);
508 
509                 items.hide();
510 
511                 // toggle tab from event
512                 if (active) {
513                     animateSlideToggle(promo, current, tab, maxmin);
514                 }
515 
516                 animateMaxMinFilter(promo, current, tab, maxmin, function () {
517                     $(tab).addClass("active");
518                 });
519 
520             },
521 
522             /**
523               * Default mobile feature navigation.
524               * @function
525               */
526             mobileNavigation: function () {
527 
528                 var genres = null,
529                     display = false;
530 
531                 // insert tabs list, active tab on request
532                 if (1 > $(".nav-pages-exceeded").length) {
533                     if ($(".unknown-resource").length > 0) {
534                         tabs.each(function (i, e) {
535                             if ($(e).hasClass("active")) {
536                                 var href = $(e).attr("href");
537                                 display = true;
538                                 $(href.replace("#", ".")).show();
539                             }
540                         });
541                     }
542                 }
543 
544                 current = $(items.each(function (i, e) {
545                     $(tabs.get(i)).data("index", i);
546                     if ($(e).hasClass("genres")) {
547                         /** do any associated content hide/shows */
548                         genres = $(e);
549                         $('ul li ul', e).hide();
550                         $('ul li a.chevron', e).addClass('chevron-collapsed');
551                         $('ul li a.chevron', e).removeClass('chevron');
552                     }
553                 }).get(index));
554 
555                 // toggle tab from event
556                 if (active) {
557                     current.show().siblings(".module").hide();
558                 }
559 
560                 tabs.bind("click", function (e) {
561 
562                     e.preventDefault();
563                     e.stopPropagation();
564 
565                     tab = $(e.target);
566 
567                     previous = current;
568                     index = tab.data("index");
569                     current = $(items.get(index));
570 
571                     items.hide();
572                     current.show();
573 
574                     $(tabs).removeClass("active");
575                     $(tab).addClass("active");
576 
577                 });
578 
579                 $("li a", genres).bind("click", function (e) {
580 
581                     var genre = $(e.target);
582 
583                     if (genre.hasClass('chevron-collapsed')) {
584                         e.preventDefault();
585                         e.stopPropagation();
586                         $("ul", genre.parent()).show();
587 
588                     } else if (genre.hasClass('chevron')) {
589                         e.preventDefault();
590                         e.stopPropagation();
591                         $("ul", genre.parent()).hide();
592 
593                     }
594 
595                     genre.toggleClass('chevron-collapsed');
596                     genre.toggleClass('chevron');
597 
598                 });
599 
600             },
601 
602 
603 
604 
605 
606             /*************************************************************************/
607             /*************************************************************************/
608 
609             /**
610               * Set default request properties
611               */
612             keepnet: function () {
613 
614                 var that = this,
615                     opts = that.obj,
616                     player = $('#pc-keepnet-player-box'),
617                     episodes = $('#pc-keepnet-player-episodes'),
618                     keyname = $("#blq-content"),
619                     desktop = opts.desktop,
620                     id = desktop.audio.id;
621 
622                 /*
623                  * Helper function for episode swapping
624                  */
625                 var swapEpisode = function (url, ep, play) {
626 
627                     if (player.length > 0) {
628 
629                         var emp = that.initEmpMediaPlayer(id, url, play);
630 
631                         if ("write" in emp) {
632                             $("li", episodes).removeClass('episode-selected');
633                             $("#pc-emp-episode-" + ep, episodes).addClass('episode-selected');
634                             emp.write();
635                         }
636 
637                         if (1 > $("li", episodes).length) {
638                             episodes.addClass('blq-hide');
639                         }
640 
641                         player.removeClass("blq-hide");
642 
643                     }
644 
645                 };
646 
647                 /*
648                  * Initiates elements for mobile show/hide elements:
649                  *  - featured container,
650                  *  - stations, genres, search tabs
651                  *  - subgenres show/hide
652                  *  - finder
653                  *
654                  */
655                 // set up the results info panels
656                 var resultsInfo = $(".pc-further-data"),
657                     resultsInfoPanel = [],
658                     urlHash = '',
659                     keyPath = '';
660 
661                 // add an overlay for each infopanel
662                 resultsInfo.each(function (i) {
663                     var resultId = resultsInfo[i].id,
664                         resultSplit = resultId.split('-');
665 
666                     $("#pc-sidebox-alsocontent .blq-hide").removeClass("blq-hide");
667 
668                     resultId = resultSplit[resultSplit.length - 1];
669                     resultsInfoPanel[resultId] = new Overlay("#pc-further-" + resultId);
670 
671                 });
672 
673                 /*
674                  *  Show promo infopanel on mouse over
675                  */
676                 $(".pc-i").bind('mouseover', function (e) {
677                     var resultId = this.id,
678                         resultSplit = resultId.split('-');
679 
680                     resultId = resultSplit[resultSplit.length - 1];
681                     resultsInfoPanel[resultId].show();
682 
683                     $("#pc-further-" + resultId).parents(".gelui-overlay-container").addClass("pc-overlay-static");
684                     $("#pc-further-" + resultId).css('left', e.pageX - 240 + 'px');
685                     $("#pc-further-" + resultId).css('top', e.pageY - 50 + 'px');
686 
687                 });
688 
689                 /*
690                  * Hide promo infopanel on mouse out
691                  */
692                 $(".pc-i").bind('mouseout', function () {
693                     var resultId = this.id,
694                         resultSplit = resultId.split('-');
695 
696                     resultId = resultSplit[resultSplit.length - 1];
697                     resultsInfoPanel[resultId].hide();
698                 });
699 
700                 /*
701                  * Hide promo infopanel on mouse out
702                  */
703                 $(".pc-i").bind('blur', function () {
704                     var resultId = this.id,
705                         resultSplit = resultId.split('-');
706 
707                     resultId = resultSplit[resultSplit.length - 1];
708                     resultsInfoPanel[resultId].hide();
709                 });
710 
711                 if (isAppleAgent()) {
712                     return false;
713                 }
714 
715                 $(".pc-script-showme").removeClass("blq-hide");
716                 $(".pc-script-hideme").addClass("blq-hide");
717 
718                 if (1 <= keyname.length) {
719                     keyname = keyname.attr("class").replace(/.+?pc-keyname-/g, "");
720                 } else {
721                     keyname = false;
722                 }
723 
724                 if (keyname !== false) {
725                     // check if # value in URL
726                     urlHash = window.location.hash.substring(12);
727                     keyPath = playlistUrl + 'series/' + keyname;
728                     if (urlHash.length > 0) {
729                         swapEpisode(keyPath + '/episode' + parseInt(urlHash, 10) + '.xml', parseInt(urlHash, 10), true);
730                     } else {
731                         swapEpisode(keyPath + '/episode1.xml', 1, false);
732                     }
733                 }
734 
735                 /*
736                  * Swap episodes after player button was clicked
737                  */
738                 $(".pc-keepnet-player-playbuttons a").click(function () {
739                     var resultId = this.id,
740                         resultSplit = resultId.split('-');
741                     resultId = resultSplit[resultSplit.length - 1];
742                     swapEpisode(playlistUrl + 'series/' + keyname + '/episode' + resultId + '.xml', resultId, true);
743                     return false;
744                 });
745 
746             },
747 
748             /**
749               * Initiates EMP.
750               * @param {String} domId Dom element ID.
751               * @param {String} url PLaylist URL.
752               * @param {Boolean} auto Flag to toggle clip's auto play.
753               * @function
754               * @returns {Object} emp Instance of EMP object.
755               */
756             initEmpMediaPlayer: function (domId, url, auto) {
757 
758                 var emp = new empMediaPlayer.Player(),
759                     opts = this.obj,
760                     id = (typeof domId !== "undefined") ? domId : opts.emp.id,
761                     playlist = (typeof url !== "undefined") ? url : opts.emp.playlist,
762                     mobile = opts.mobile || {},
763                     desktop = opts.desktop || {},
764                     height, width, play = auto || false;
765 
766                 if ($("#" + id).length > 0) {
767                     if (isMobile()) {
768                         height = mobile.video.height;
769                         width = mobile.video.width;
770                     } else {
771                         if (isKeepnet()) {
772                             height = desktop.audio.height;
773                             width = desktop.audio.width;
774                         } else {
775                             height = desktop.video.height;
776                             width = desktop.video.width;
777                         }
778                     }
779 
780                     emp.setDomId(id);
781                     emp.setWidth(width);
782                     emp.setHeight(height);
783                     emp.setPlaylist(playlist);
784                     emp.set("config_settings_autoPlay", play);
785 
786                     if (isMobile()) {
787                         emp.set('enable3G', true);
788                     }
789 
790                 }
791 
792                 return emp;
793             },
794 
795             /**
796               * Initiates Podcast search bar and results.
797               * @function
798               */
799             initFinder: function () {
800 
801                 //create the input box
802                 $('.search').prepend(this.getFinderFormHtml());
803 
804                 var that = this,
805                     opts = this.obj,
806                     url = opts.search.url,
807                     maxlength = opts.search.maxlength;
808 
809                 qfInput = $('#pc-quickfind-box', '.search');
810 
811                 if (1 > qfInput.length) {
812                     return false;
813                 }
814 
815                 // init events
816                 that.initSearchEvents();
817 
818                 var myAutoSuggest = new AutoSuggest(
819                     qfInput, url + "?q={input}"
820                 );
821 
822                 var getResult = function (result, item, genre) {
823 
824                     if (genre) {
825                         result.base = "/podcasts/genre/";
826                         result.title = item.genreTitle;
827                         result.name = item.genreKey;
828                     } else {
829                         result.title = item.displayTitle;
830                         result.name = item.keepnet;
831                         result.img = item.artwork;
832                         result.desc = item.podDescription;
833                         result.alt = item.fullTitle;
834                     }
835 
836                     return result;
837                 };
838 
839                 list = $(opts.search.id);
840                 gelui = list.parents("div.gelui-1-autosuggest");
841 
842                 /**
843                   * Determine visual state from input, eg., 'active' / 'inactive'
844                   * @function
845                   */
846                 myAutoSuggest.signals.inputchanged.add(function () {
847                     qfInput.addClass('active');
848                     usersQuery = qfInput.val();
849                 });
850 
851                 // When new data is ready remove all of the stale data
852                 myAutoSuggest.signals.dataready.removeAll();
853 
854                 /**
855                   * Determine results from input
856                   * @param {Object} e Results data
857                   * @function
858                   */
859                 myAutoSuggest.signals.dataready.add(function (e) {
860 
861                     var suggestions = e.data,
862                         limit = opts.search.items,
863                         i;
864 
865                     $("li", opts.search.id).remove();
866 
867                     // If there are no results, explain this to the user
868                     if (suggestions.isEmpty || suggestions.length === 0 || (suggestions[1] !== undefined && suggestions[1].length === 0)) {
869 
870                         var html = '<span class="pc-quickfind-title">' +
871                             'Sorry, no matches for "<span class="pc-quickfind-match">%%QUERY%%</span>"</span>';
872 
873                         suggestions = [{
874                             error: true,
875                             displayTitle: html.replace("%%QUERY%%", usersQuery)
876                         }];
877 
878                     } else {
879 
880                         // no limit on results if mobile
881                         if (isMobile() && suggestions.length > limit) {
882                             limit = suggestions.length;
883                         }
884 
885                         // filter suggestions for genre
886                         $(suggestions).filter(function (i, e) {
887                             if (this.hasOwnProperty("genreKey")) {
888                                 suggestions = [];
889                                 suggestions.push(e);
890                             }
891                         });
892 
893                     }
894 
895                     // loop results
896                     for (i = 0; i < limit; i += 1) {
897                         this.signals.appenditem.dispatch({
898                             item: suggestions[i]
899                         });
900                     }
901 
902                     // render results
903                     this.signals.displayitems.dispatch();
904 
905                 }, myAutoSuggest);
906 
907                 // Appending items
908                 myAutoSuggest.signals.appenditem.removeAll();
909 
910                 // This function creates html output for each item
911                 myAutoSuggest.signals.appenditem.add(function (e) {
912 
913                     if (!e.item) {
914                         return false;
915                     }
916 
917                     var genre = false,
918                         item = e.item,
919                         container = '<li><a><span class="pc-quickfind-title">See all podcasts for "%%TITLE%%"</span></a></li>',
920                         artwork, heading, text,
921                         result = {title: "", desc: "", name: "", base: "", img: "", type: "pc-quickfind-single-result", alt: ""};
922 
923                     if (item.hasOwnProperty("genreTitle")) {
924                         genre = true;
925                     }
926 
927                     result = getResult(result, item, genre);
928 
929                     // catch service library responses
930                     if (item.hasOwnProperty("errorCode")) {
931                         item.error = true;
932                         result.title = '<span class="pc-quickfind-title pc-quickfind-single">' +
933                             item.errorMessage + ' "<span class="pc-quickfind-match">' +
934                             item.errorCode + '</span>"</span>';
935                     }
936 
937                     result.base = (result.name !== undefined) ? result.base.concat(result.name) : "#";
938 
939                     container = container.replace(/%%TITLE%%/g, result.title);
940 
941                     if (item.error) {
942 
943                         // display the error
944                         container = $(container).find("a").bind("click", function (e) {
945                                 e.stopPropagation();
946                                 e.preventDefault();
947                             }).html(result.title).end();
948 
949                     } else {
950 
951                         // add the artwork and heading
952                         if (!genre) {
953 
954                             artwork = '<span class="pc-quickfind-artwork"><img width="64" height="64"/></span>';
955                             artwork = $(artwork).find("img").attr({src: result.img}).end(); //, alt: result.alt
956                             heading = $('<span class="pc-quickfind-title"></span>').html(result.title);
957                             container = $(container).find("a").html(artwork).append(heading).end();
958 
959                         }
960 
961                     }
962 
963                     if (genre || item.error) {
964                         container = $(container).addClass("pc-result-none")
965                             .find("span.pc-quickfind-title").addClass("pc-quickfind-single").end();
966                     }
967 
968                     // add a description for desktop if it exists
969                     if (!isMobile() && (result.desc !== undefined && result.desc !== "")) {
970                         text = $('<span class="pc-quickfind-description"></span>').html("<br/>" + result.desc);
971                         container = $(container).find("a").append(text).end();
972                     }
973 
974                     container = $(container).find("a").attr({href: result.base, 'class': result.type}).end();
975 
976                     list.append(container);
977 
978                     qfInput.removeClass('active');
979 
980                     if (isMobile()) {
981                         $('div.search').append(gelui.remove());
982                     }
983 
984                     if (!isMobile()) {
985                         $(opts.search.id).addClass("active").fadeIn(100);
986                     }
987 
988                 }, myAutoSuggest);
989 
990                 /**
991                   * Set search text.
992                   * @param {Object} e Input properties from "quickfind".
993                   * @function
994                   */
995                 myAutoSuggest.signals.itemhighlighted.add(function (e) {
996 
997                     var keyPressed  = e.keyPressed,
998                         keyCode     = this.keyCode,
999                         $item       = $(e.item),
1000                         $input      = this.$input;
1001 
1002                     if (keyPressed && (keyPressed === keyCode.DOWNARROW || keyPressed === keyCode.UPARROW)) {
1003                         if ($item.length > 0) {
1004                             $input.val(truncate($(".pc-quickfind-title", $item).text(), maxlength));
1005                         } else {
1006                             $input.val(truncate(usersQuery, maxlength));
1007                         }
1008                     }
1009 
1010                 }, myAutoSuggest);
1011 
1012                 /**
1013                   * Set active search selection.
1014                   * @param {Object} e Input properties from "quickfind".
1015                   * @function
1016                   */
1017                 myAutoSuggest.signals.itemselected.add(function (e) {
1018 
1019                     var href    = (e.item !== undefined) ? $("a", e.item).attr("href") : false,
1020                         $item   = $(e.item),
1021                         $input  = this.$input;
1022 
1023                     if (href) {
1024                         $input.val(truncate($(".pc-quickfind-title", $item).text(), maxlength));
1025                         window.location.href = href;
1026                         return true;
1027                     } else {
1028                         $input.val(truncate(usersQuery, maxlength));
1029                     }
1030 
1031                 }, myAutoSuggest);
1032 
1033             },
1034 
1035             /**
1036               * Creates quickfind HTML code
1037               * @function
1038               * @returns {Object:jQuery} domHtml Object containing HTML nodes
1039               */
1040             getFinderFormHtml: function () {
1041 
1042                 var value = (isMobile()) ? "(e.g. Football)" : "Type podcast name (e.g. football)",
1043                     text = "";
1044 
1045                 return $("<input>").prop("defaultValue", value).attr({
1046                     type: "text",
1047                     id: "pc-quickfind-box",
1048                     autocomplete: "off",
1049                     "class": "pc-quickfind-waiting pc-search-inactive",
1050                     value: value
1051                 }).bind("keyup", function (e) {
1052 
1053                     var code = e.keyCode;
1054 
1055                     text = (this.value !== "" && this.value !== value && this.value !== this.defaultValue) ? this.value : text;
1056                     text = (usersQuery !== undefined && usersQuery !== "" && usersQuery !== this.defaultValue) ? usersQuery : text;
1057 
1058                     if (code === 13) {
1059                         this.value = text;
1060                     }
1061 
1062                     if ((code >= 65 && code <= 90) || (code >= 48 && code <= 57)) {
1063                         $(this).addClass("active");
1064                     }
1065 
1066                     if (/(13|40|38)/.test(code) || this.value === "") {
1067                         $(this).removeClass("active");
1068                     }
1069 
1070                 }).appendTo(
1071                     $('<div id="pc-quickfind"><fieldset id="pc-quickfind-area"><p id="pc-quickfind-intro">' +
1072                     '<label for="pc-quickfind-box">Find Podcast:</label></p></fieldset></div>').find("p")
1073                 ).parents("div#pc-quickfind");
1074 
1075             },
1076 
1077             /**
1078               * Initiates quickfind state from triggered events (CTAs), e.g., focused CSS, etc
1079               * @function
1080               */
1081             initSearchEvents: function () {
1082 
1083                 var opts = this.obj;
1084 
1085                 // remove the default text in the search box
1086                 qfInput.focusin(function () {
1087                     if (this.value === this.defaultValue) {
1088                         this.value = "";
1089                         $('#pc-quickfind').addClass('active');
1090                     }
1091                 });
1092 
1093                 // remove the default text in the search box
1094                 qfInput.focusout(function () {
1095 
1096                     if (this.value === "") {
1097                         this.value = this.defaultValue;
1098                         $(this).removeClass('active');
1099                         $("#pc-quickfind").removeClass('active');
1100                     }
1101 
1102                     if (!isMobile()) {
1103                         if ($(opts.search.id).is(":visible")) {
1104                             $(opts.search.id).fadeOut(100, function () {
1105                                 $(this).removeClass("active");
1106                             });
1107                         }
1108                     }
1109 
1110                 });
1111 
1112             }
1113 
1114         };
1115 
1116     };
1117 
1118 });
